title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR file using the packager, pressing the finish button triggers an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: The JAR packager should not report an error related to unsaved editors when creating a JAR file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Edit a file without saving it.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project containing the unsaved file.
3. Enter all the required details such as path, destination, name, description, etc for the JAR packager.
4. Press the finish button to create the JAR file.
